name: Final Reckoning: CrimsonFire
description:
Overview:

Bandits have landed on the planet you have sworn to protect. Gather your squad and work together with turn-based tactical combat game play to repeal them and secure your planet. 

Attack from the side to hit them where they are weak, make use of shotguns to hit multiple scattered enemies or use a grenade to hit enemies that take refuge in cover. Take clever of use of cover to protect your own units and take care to line up enemies so that your attacks hit multiple enemies. 

In addition to fighting the bandits you also will explore the surface of the planet and can find supplies that can help you out in combat from first aid to grenades and shotgun ammo.

Game makes use of only the mouse and uses a radius menu to help guide you in interactions with the game.

Music: http://www.purple-planet.com
